name: Spike a Love Story
description:
Spike a Love Story puts you in the spikes of a lonely trap in a long forgotten video game. As its only contact is the game mascot, it has grown an attachment to that one source of stimulus, with only a singular means of expressing itself: brutal smashing action! A retro-resurgence of interest in this game world has suddenly given Spike what it has longed for: endless chances to show the game mascot its love. You know, by violently smooshing him.

CONTROLS FOR STORY AND SURVIVAL MODE:
On keyboard, press X or SPACEBAR to activate Spike, or the 'South' button on your X-Box or PlayStation Game Controller. They all do the same thing: SMASH.

CONTROLS FOR LOCAL TWO PLAYER AND AI BATTLE:

SPIKE:
X key or SPACEBAR or 'SOUTH' button on Game Controller to SMASH
Z key or 'WEST' button on Game Controller to FAKE OUT MOVE
C key or Game Controller RIGHT SHOULDER BUTTON for SPECIAL ATTACK

GUY:

A and D or LEFT/RIGHT ARROWS, LEFT STICK on Game Controller to MOVE
SHIFT key or LEFT SHOULDER BUTTON to WALK
SPACEBAR or UP ARROW, 'SOUTH' button on Game Controller to JUMP
C key or RIGHT SHOULDER BUTTON for SPECIAL ATTACK

Requires Windows 7 or above, 64 bit.
